p: Ethnobotanical and ethnomedicinal studies in different parts of Ethiopia indicated that Ximenia americana plants have diverse use in the country. Culturally, the plant is utilized as a medicine for various animal and plant diseases. It is reported to give relief to stomach complaints, placenta expulsion [ 38], internal parasitism, worm infestations [ 39], treatment of hepatitis, and malaria ( Table 1) [ 42].
